// src/Dashboard/Dashboard.jsx
import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{FileText,BarChart3,ClipboardList,PersonStandingIcon}from"lucide-react";import"./Dashboard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dashboard(){const navigate=useNavigate();const apps=[{title:"Issue Tracker",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClipboardList,{className:"card-icon"}),description:"Manage your issues and tasks",stats:"23 new Issues",path:"*"},{title:"HRMS Tools",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PersonStandingIcon,{className:"card-icon"}),description:"Tools for HR and employee management",stats:"3 events today",path:"*"},{title:"Documents",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FileText,{className:"card-icon"}),description:"Access and edit your documents",stats:"5 recent files",path:"*"},{title:"Analytics",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChart3,{className:"card-icon"}),description:"View insights and reports",stats:"Updated 2h ago",path:"*"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dashboard-container",style:{maxWidth:"1200px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid-container",children:apps.map((app,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",onClick:()=>navigate(app.path),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-icon-container",children:app.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card-stats",children:app.stats})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:app.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-description",children:app.description})]},index))})});}export default Dashboard;
